Title: WPFSharp.Globalizer
Description: WPFSharp Globalizer - A project deisgned to make localization and styling easier by decoupling both processes from the build.
HomeWiki:
This project has moved to GitHub !

http://rhyous.github.io/WPFSharp.Globalizer

A library for localizing WPF that decouples localization from build as well as providing the technology to change the language at runtime, including a separate style for the language.

Get it from NuGet: https://www.nuget.org/packages/WPFSharp.Globalizer

Use XAML files that can be easily updated with any text editor. Never go into localization lock down again.
